name: Vegan Almond Halwa (Instant Pot Badam Halwa) Oil-free
description: Vegan Almond Halwa & Almond Ladoo - Instant Pot Badam Halwa with no added refined oil. No ghee or dairy! 5 Mins active time. 6 Ingredients! Gluten-free Grain-free Soy-free Recipe. Makes 4 Indian size servings
recipeIngredient: 1/3 cup sugar ((cane sugar,conut sugar, or jaggery powder))
Flavors: cardamom seeds from 4 green cardamom pods(see note), or 6 to 8 saffron strands, or 1/8 tsp cinnamon, or 1/2 tsp rose water

recipeInstructions.text: Add hot water to a baking dish or pyrex** that fits your instant pot. Add the sugar and mix in. Add the lime juice, salt and flavors(cardamom, saffron etc) and mix in. (See notes for stove top)
recipeInstructions.name: Add hot water to a baking dish or pyrex** that fits your instant pot. Add the sugar and mix in. Add the lime juice, salt and flavors(cardamom, saffron etc) and mix in. (See notes for stove top)

recipeInstructions.text: Add almond flour and press and mix. With less water, you will have to press and mix so there are no dry lumps. if making the thinner halwa, use a whisk to mix in the almond flour.
recipeInstructions.name: Add almond flour and press and mix. With less water, you will have to press and mix so there are no dry lumps. if making the thinner halwa, use a whisk to mix in the almond flour.

recipeInstructions.text: Add 1.5 cups of water to the instant pot. Place the dish in the steamer basket and lower into the instant pot. Cover with a light lid or foil.
recipeInstructions.name: Add 1.5 cups of water to the instant pot. Place the dish in the steamer basket and lower into the instant pot. Cover with a light lid or foil.

recipeInstructions.text: Close the lid and pressure cook for 5 minutes at high pressure. Let the pressure release naturally.
recipeInstructions.name: Close the lid and pressure cook for 5 minutes at high pressure. Let the pressure release naturally.

recipeInstructions.text: Carefully remove the dish from the instant pot. Garnish with chopped nuts, raisins or chopped dates and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Carefully remove the dish from the instant pot. Garnish with chopped nuts, raisins or chopped dates and serve.

recipeInstructions.text: To make ladoos: Chill almond halwa made with 3 tbsp water, for half an hour, then roll into balls. Roll in coconut, finely chopped nuts or seeds of choice, or drizzle with chocolate for a halloween treat.

recipeInstructions.text: Store: Store on the counter for the day. Refrigerate for upto 5 days.
